group5.trackerexpress

Class ExpenseList

  • java.lang.Object
    • group5.trackerexpress.TModel
      • group5.trackerexpress.ExpenseList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ExpenseList
extends TModel
    Holds the expenses for a single claim.
    Version:
    Part 4
    Author:
    Peter Crinklaw, Randy Hu, Parash Rahman, Jesse Emery, Sean Baergen, Rishi Barnwal
    See Also:
    Claim, Expense, Serialized Form

      • deleteView

        public void deleteView(TView view)
        Description copied from class: TModel
        Delete view. NOTE: Calling this may not be enough, as the model may contain objects that also need to have deleteView get called. Eg, Expense list overrides this method and calls delete view on its expenses.
        Overrides:
        deleteView in class TModel
        Parameters:
        expenseListFragment -
